TopicTitle: Firespitter wheels cause plane to endlessly reverse

Articles.Content: I've just built an aircraft with mod parts, the landing gear specifically being from the Firespitter mod. Even when I load the craft, it starts moving backwards, but it stops when the engine starts and is put at full thrust. But when I try to land the plane and stop, it begins to go into reverse again. I turned off the reverse movement in the wheels, but it didn't stop. Starting the engine doesn't do anything, nor does braking, only an annoyingly loud noise. What could be the issue?
Had the same issue, partially solved with installing ksp recall and kspwheels.  Of course my luck I still can't get anything but basic rovers to behave except in a bone stock install.

Why not post in the firespitter thread? where a lot more people who use the mod will likely see this?

Also you will have to provide much more information for any real help.  Especially things like ya know, KSP version, mod version etc.
